description: Smallest k>1 such that k(p-1)-1 is divisible by p^2, p=n-th prime.
prog: (PARI) a(n) = {my(p = prime(n), k = 2); while ((k*(p-1)-1) % p^2, k++); k;} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Sep 28 2013
author: _Felice Russo_
extensions: Added constraint on k to the definition, otherwise a(1)=1 - _R. J. Mathar_, Oct 10 2010
